"><tr><td>

     <p style=3D"font: normal 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#=
5F636A; line-height: 17px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">October 3</p>

     <p style=3D"font: normal 30px Avenir, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;=
 color:#223645; white-space: nowrap; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;">haplolo=
gy =20
       <a href=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/mw/link.php?M=3D2103613&amp=
;N=3D9808&amp;L=3D13886" style=3D"border: none;"><img src=3D"http://www.=
drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_icon_blue_audio_prod.jpg" wid=
th=3D"21" height=3D"19" alt=3D"audio pron" border=3D"0" style=3D"border:=
 none;"/></a>=20
<span style=3D"font: italic 12px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#5F=
636A; white-space: nowrap;">&nbsp;&nbsp;\hap-LAH-luh-jee\</span>
<br />
</p>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

   <!-- DEFINITION/AMPERSAND/EXAMPLES/ADS TABLE BEGINS -->
   <table width=3D"100%" border=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0=
"><tr><td width=3D"500">

<div style=3D"font: normal 17px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#223=
645;">
Definition
</div>

<div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<div style=3D"font: italic 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#5F6=
36A; text-align: left;">
<i>noun</i>
</div>

<div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<div style=3D"font: normal 14px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #00=
0000; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: left;">
<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"400">
<tr>
<td width=3D'25' valign=3D'top'><div style=3D"font: normal 13px Arial, H=
elvetica, sans-serif; color: #7E7E7E; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-al=
ign: left;"><b>:</b></div></td>
<td width=3D'375' valign=3D'top'><div style=3D"font: normal 13px Arial, =
Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-a=
lign: left;"><div>contraction of a word by omission of one or more simil=
ar sounds or syllables</div></div></td>
</tr>
</table>


</div>

<div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<!-- Ampersand section BEGINS -->
<img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_ampers=
and_dot_section_top.gif" width=3D"385" height=3D"13" alt=3D"dots" border=
=3D"0" style=3D"border: none;" /><br />

<table width=3D"438" border=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0">
  <tr>
    <td><img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod201=
5_ampersand_graphic.gif" width=3D"86" height=3D"68" alt=3D"ampersand" bo=
rder=3D"0" style=3D"border: none; float: left;"/> </td>
    <td style=3D"font: normal 14px Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif=
; color: #223645; line-height: 17px;">Sept- means &quot;seven&quot;; oct=
o- &quot;eight.&quot; September is the 9th month; October is the 10th. H=
uh? <a href=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/mw/link.php?M=3D2103613&amp;N=3D=
9808&amp;L=3D12686">How the months got their names.</a></td>
  </tr>
</table>

<img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_ampers=
and_dot_section_btm.gif" width=3D"385" height=3D"13" alt=3D"dots" border=
=3D"0" style=3D"border:none;" />
<!-- Ampersand section ENDS -->

<div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<div style=3D"font: normal 17px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; color:#2236=
45">Examples</div>

<div style=3D"font-size: 11px; line-height: 11px;">&nbsp;</div>

<div style=3D"font: normal 14px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #22=
3645; line-height: 17px;">
<div>
	The speech therapist assured the child&#39;s parents that &quot;the ten=
dency towards <em>haplology</em> will likely correct itself with age.&qu=
ot;</div>
<div>
	&nbsp;</div>
<div>
	&quot;<em>Haplology</em> is responsible for a variety of forms found in=
 rapid speech in English: not just probly, but also libry (library), nes=
ry (necessary), interpretive (interpretative), and others.&quot; &mdash;=
 Gretchen McCulloch, <em>Slate.com</em>, 4 Apr. 2014</div>

</div>

<div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 25px;">&nbsp;</div>

<img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_ampers=
and_dot_section.gif" width=3D"385" height=3D"13" alt=3D"dots" border=3D"=
0" style=3D"border: none;" />

<div style=3D"font-size: 8px; line-height: 8px;">&nbsp;</div>


<div style=3D"font: normal 12px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #43=
4343; line-height: 18px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-style: italic;"=
>

</div>

6&amp;m=3D6e1aff0cd42836b3e34d8f2334854040&amp;p=3D9808" height=3D"1" wi=
dth=3D"10" alt=3D""/></td><td><img src=3D"http://li.mw.drhinternet.net/i=
mp?s=3D10136&amp;sz=3D1x1&amp;li=3D6&amp;m=3D6e1aff0cd42836b3e34d8f23348=
54040&amp;p=3D9808" height=3D"1" width=3D"10" alt=3D""/></td></tr><tr><t=
d align=3D"left"><a href=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/mw/link.php?M=3D2=
103613&amp;N=3D9808&amp;L=3D12063&amp;C=3D7b90c08dc1dccc3d0cde0a3a4e9911=
be" rel=3D"nofollow"><img src=3D"http://li.mw.drhinternet.net/imp?s=3D37=
58&amp;sz=3D116x15&amp;li=3D6&amp;m=3D6e1aff0cd42836b3e34d8f2334854040&a=
mp;p=3D9808" border=3D"0" alt=3D""/></a></td><td align=3D"right"><a href=
=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/mw/link.php?M=3D2103613&amp;N=3D9808&amp;=
L=3D12064&amp;C=3D7b90c08dc1dccc3d0cde0a3a4e9911be" rel=3D"nofollow"><im=
g src=3D"http://li.mw.drhinternet.net/imp?s=3D96400&amp;sz=3D69x15&amp;l=
i=3D6&amp;m=3D6e1aff0cd42836b3e34d8f2334854040&amp;p=3D9808" border=3D"0=
" alt=3D""/></a></td></tr></table>
<!-- End 300x250 2 -->


       </td>
      </tr>

       <tr>
       <td height=3D"15">&nbsp; </td>
      </tr>

     </table>
     <!-- AD SPACE NESTED TABLE 3 ENDS -->

   <!-- DEFINITION/AMPERSAND/EXAMPLES/ADS TABLE ENDS -->
   </td></tr></table>

     <div style=3D"font: normal 17px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; color:=
#223645">Did You Know?</div>
    =20
     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>
    =20
<div style=3D"font: normal 14px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #22=
3645; line-height: 17px;">
<div>
	Try to say &quot;pierced-ear earrings&quot; three times fast. That exer=
cise will demonstrate why haplology happens: sometimes it&#39;s just eas=
ier to drop a syllable and leave yourself with something that&#39;s easi=
er to say (such as &quot;pierced earrings&quot;). American philologist M=
aurice Bloomfield recognized the tendency to drop one of a pair of simil=
ar syllables over 120 years ago. He has been credited with joining the c=
ombining form <em>hapl</em>- or <em>haplo</em>- (meaning &quot;single&qu=
ot;) with -<em>logy</em> (meaning &quot;oral or written expression&quot;=
) to create <em>haplology</em> as a name for the phenomenon. Haplology i=
s quite common in English, and often the contracted forms it generates s=
pread into the written language. In fact, haplology played a role in nam=
ing the nation that is the cradle of English: <em>England</em> was conde=
nsed via haplology from &quot;<em>Engla land</em>.&quot;</div>

</div>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 20px; line-height: 25px;">&nbsp;</div>
    =20
<img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_ampers=
and_dot_section.gif" width=3D"385" height=3D"13" alt=3D"dots" border=3D"=
0" style=3D"border: none;" />

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

     <div style=3D"font: normal 17px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; color:=
#223645">Test Your Vocabulary</div>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<div style=3D"font: normal 14px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #22=
3645; line-height: 16px;">
<div>
	Fill in the blanks to create a term for the loss of one or more sounds =
at the beginning of a word, as in <em>round</em> for <em>around</em> and=
 <em>coon </em>for <em>raccoon</em>:</div>
<div>
	ap _ _ er _ s _ s. <a href=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/mw/link.php?M=3D=
2103613&amp;N=3D9808&amp;L=3D13887">The answer is &hellip;</a></div>

</div>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

<img src=3D"http://www.drhinternet.net/images/wodhtml2010/wod2015_ampers=
and_dot_section.gif" width=3D"385" height=3D"13" alt=3D"dots" border=3D"=
0" style=3D"border: none;" />

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>

     <div style=3D"font: normal 17px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; color:=
#223645">Want More?</div>

     <div style=3D"font-size: 13px; line-height: 13px;">&nbsp;</div>
=20
